item.description:
Change in venue - the CBS Scene is all booked up already, but we found a place down the road that looks great.

Stoneforge â€“ Foxboro invites you to join us in experiencing a culinary adventure highlighting Global Rustic Cuisine. Our ambiance includes Fireside Dining and an open Exhibition Kitchen featuring Stoneforge Espetars and Wood Grilled Entrees. Open for Lunch and Dinner. Conveniently located One Mile from Gillette Stadium.

We will still be joining Red Sox Natives for maximum fan faire! Hope you can join us.


Free event.
item.how_to_find_us: Reservation under Red Sox Natives Meetup
item.name: Pats vs. Bills
